column4: could it be that i'm having installation problems because i'm trying to install on a ext4 partition?
im sorry, i forgot about you! did you ever determine the build type of your cpu?
eww.. ok, you said it was stuck on what?
it was stuck on installation, caps lock blinking and computer not responding to anything (several times during installation! in different stages!) i had to plug it out of the electricity
ouch, hrm, what board? run sudo ldhw | grep board
it was stuck on installation, caps lock blinking and computer not responding to anything (several times during installation! in different stages!) i had to plug it out of the electricity
sorry for repeating missed that replay.. which i can't make sense of anyway... you mean to type that into the run command?
sudo ldhw | grep board didnt do anything on run command...
ok i'm there... what exactly am i looking for?
